summary.span: 表示 属性。

span.span: Represents a property.

para.span: 这表示属性 (名称、允许的值等) 的架构信息 。

span.span: This represents schema information (name, allowed values, etc) of a property.

para.span: 由于这只是架构信息，因此没有用于获取/设置此属性的值的 "值" 等字段。

span.span: Since this is just schema information, there is no field like "Value" used to get/set the value of this property.

para.span: 手动实例化此类的用户应记得在设置 第一个属性之前和 设置对象的最后一个属性后调用。

span.span: Those who manually instantiate this class should remember to call before setting the first property and after setting the last property of the object.

comment.span: 此分部类包含所有公共属性，因此可以在 XAML 中设置这些属性。

span.span: This partial class contains all properties which are public and hence settable in XAML.

comment.span: 在下面的另一个分部类中定义了内部属性。

span.span: Those properties that are internal are defined in another partial class below.

comment.span: 此分部类包含自动生成、内部等的成员。其他分部类包含可以在 XAML 中设置的公共属性。

span.span: This partial class contains members that are auto-generated, internal, etc. Whereas the other partial class contains public properties that can be set in XAML.

span.span: This field is optional and has the default value of true.

summary.span: 用于将一个开关与开关值进行分隔的标记。

span.span: The token used to separate a switch from its value.

remarks.span: 此处指定的值将覆盖为父对象指定的 值 。

span.span: The value specified here overrides the value specified for the parent 's .

remarks.span: 此字段是可选的，并且区域性固定。

span.span: This field is optional and culture invariant.
Example: Consider /D:WIN32.

example.span: 在此开关和值的表示形式中，"：" 是分隔符，因为它将 switch D 与其值 WIN32分隔开。

span.span: In this switch and value representation, ":" is the separator since its separates the switch D from its value WIN32.

value.span: 此属性的开关表示形式。

span.span: The switch representation of this property.

remarks.span: 此字段是可选的，并且区域性固定。

span.span: This field is optional and culture invariant.

example.span: 对于 VC + + CL 任务， WholeProgramOptimization 是布尔参数。

span.span: For the VC++ CL task, WholeProgramOptimization is a boolean parameter.
It's switch is GL.

summary.span: 在此属性表示一个工具参数的情况下，此属性的开关表示形式的前缀。

span.span: The prefix for the switch representation of this property for the case when this property represents a tool parameter.

value.span: 此属性的开关表示形式的前缀。

span.span: The prefix for the switch representation of this property.

remarks.span: 此处指定的值将覆盖为父对象指定的 值 。

span.span: The value specified here overrides the value specified for the parent 's .

remarks.span: 此字段是可选的，并且区域性固定。

span.span: This field is optional and culture invariant.

example.span: 对于 VC + + CL 任务， WholeProgramOptimization 是布尔参数。

span.span: For the VC++ CL task, WholeProgramOptimization is a boolean parameter.

example.span: 它的开关为 GL ，其开关前缀 (从父级继承， 因为它不是由 WholeProgramOptimization 重写) / 。

span.span: It's switch is GL and its switch prefix (inherited from the parent since it is not overridden by WholeProgramOptimization) is /.

example.span: 因此，此属性的命令行中的完整开关将为 /gl

span.span: Thus the complete switch in the command line for this property would be /GL
